Articles.Content:
I was really just trying to see if there was a known preliminary issue, not take up your time with that (heavily-modded) craft. Here is a logfile and craft where I have reduced the number of base mods to three: [Stockalike Station Parts Expansion](https://www.google.ca/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjJqOv_uo_QAhUG3YMKHX8MCC0QFggbMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fforum.kerbalspaceprogram.com%2Findex.php%3F%2Ftopic%2F82833-12-stockalike-station-parts-expansion-oct-21-12-update%2F&usg=AFQjCNHiq5iHD2SEdRNnNfSSZrfi_l7Rlg&sig2=4YDCg9jkKZtyss1gS9DMew&bvm=bv.137901846,d.amc), [KRASH](https://spacedock.info/mod/302/KRASH%20-%20Kerbal%20Ramification%20Artifical%20Simulation%20Hub%20%28simulation%20mod%20for%20KSP%29), (and IR, of course) and had the game open for no longer than was required to duplicate the issue: 

Logfile: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/jhycq2xdha3ean1/Player_20161104_1223.log?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/jhycq2xdha3ean1/Player_20161104_1223.log?dl=0)  

Craft: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/atnieuhr2ly3uoe/Duna 6K Lander Concept Cleaner.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/atnieuhr2ly3uoe/Duna%206K%20Lander%20Concept%20Cleaner.craft?dl=0)

To duplicate. Load craft, launch, confirm that robotics work on the launchpad, deploying shield and airlock. Revert to hanger, use KRASH interface Orbit Selection > Duna > Start Simulation, notice that the central tube is now shifted up the extendatron, which has itself shifted, and the hinge is no longer in the same position.

I can make a version with no SSPE parts over the weekend, to further reduce the variables, but note that the hinge is not attached to any non-stock parts.

Revert to hanger, use KRASH interface Orbit Selection > Duna > Start Simulation, notice that the central tube is now shifted up the extendatron, which has itself shifted, and the hinge is no longer in the same position. I can make a version with no SSPE parts over the weekend, to further reduce the variables, but note that the hinge is not attached to any non-stock parts.
> 

What if you use built-in cheat engine to place the craft on Duna? I'll try that later today as well.

Just tested stock cheat (Set Orbit). It does not cause any issues, so there is something about KRASH that probably causes issues.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-04T17:30:45Z" title="11/04/2016 05:30  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 4, 2016</time> by Ziw**
Can you update this to the current version 1.2

> 
> 
> On 11/2/2016 at 1:40 AM, Ziw said:
> 
> 
> Proper module name is ModuleIRServo, but all the parts have the MuMechToggle alias still as I recall. I'll try to look at the problem later this week.
> 

I tried replacing <string name="exemptModuleType3">MuMechServo</string> with <string name="exemptModuleType3">ModuleIRServo</string> in the KJR config.xml but leaving <bool name="multiPartAttachNodeReinforcement">1</bool> hoping that it would improve things, but the IR components seemed more bound together and stuck than the default KJR config. Seems like the best current option is still simply changing multiPartAttachNodeReinforcement to 0.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Jhammer said:
> 
> 
> Can you update this to the current version 1.2
> 

Welcome to the forums.

When looking for an update to a mod it is usually good practice to check the last 3-4 pages of a thread before asking for an update. As in this case there is an updated version one page back. You will need the plugin found here

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/104535-112-magic-smoke-industries-infernal-robotics-202/&do=embed&comment=2830104&embedComment=2830104&embedDo=findComment"></iframe>

as well as parts which can be found here

**[Legacy Parts](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/download/2.0.0/IR-LegacyParts.zip) and [Rework Parts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/59359-wip-msis-infernal-robotics-model-rework-v02-pre-release-beta/&do=findComment&comment=2564645)**

Thank you. We do need to ask [@sirkut](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/57229-sirkut/) to update the thread and Curse page, but I'd like to have more feedback first. As you see there are some issues, albeit caused by other mods.

For those having the same issue, 

THIS MOD IS INCOMPATIBLE WITH [Kerbal Joint Reinforcement](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/50911-12-kerbal-joint-reinforcement-v331-102916/)!!!

Having both installed cause the moving parts to not extend or only half extend while becoming one giant clipping mess. De-installing KJR will instantly solve the problem.

> 
> 
> For those having the same issue, 
> 
>

> 
> THIS MOD IS INCOMPATIBLE WITH [Kerbal Joint Reinforcement](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/50911-12-kerbal-joint-reinforcement-v331-102916/)!!!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Having both installed cause the moving parts to not extend or only half extend while becoming one giant clipping mess. De-installing KJR will instantly solve the problem.
> 

The best answer is a little more nuanced than that Henk:

> 
> 
> On 10/31/2016 at 9:21 PM, sdfghdfgjd said:
> 
> 
> To get KJR working, you can change
> 
> 
> 
> 
>     
>     
>          name="multiPartAttachNodeReinforcement">1
> 
> 
> 
> 
> from 1 to 0 in KerbalJointReinforcement/Plugin/PluginData/KerbalJointReinforcement/config.xml
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Explanation of all the options in the [readme](https://github.com/ferram4/Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement).
>
Infernal robotic does not work landing legs on moving parts.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Harpi2600 said:
> 
> 
> Infernal robotic does not work landing legs on moving parts.
> 

New stock KSP autostrut feature as well as KJR mod is one to blaim. Posts from [one page back](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/104535-112-magic-smoke-industries-infernal-robotics-202/&do=findComment&comment=2832428).

Might be good to [raise issue on stock bug tracker](http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/projects/ksp/issues) too. Ability to add switch in part module config that will allow autostrut to some other part or ban autostrut.  

Could be used not even with IR parts, but any new parts that are planed in future releases of KSP. That way IR parts will be "safe" from accidental autostrut while still have neccessary ability for autostrut on wheels, for example.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, kcs123 said:
> 
> 
> <font><font>Nový sklad KSP autostrut funkce, stejně jako KJR mod je jedna ku blaim. </font><font>Příspěvky od </font></font>[<font><font>jednoho stánku zpět</font></font>](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/104535-112-magic-smoke-industries-infernal-robotics-202/&do=findComment&comment=2832428)<font><font> . </font></font>
> 
> 
> 
> 
> <font><font>Možná by bylo dobré, aby </font></font>[<font><font>zvýšit otázku o nutnosti sledování chyb</font></font>](http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/projects/ksp/issues)<font><font> taky. </font><font>Možnost přidat přepínač část modulu config, který umožní autostrut na jiné součásti nebo zákaz autostrut. </font></font>  
> <font><font>Může být použit ani s IR dílů, ale všechny nové díly, které jsou plánovány v budoucích verzích KSP. </font><font>Tímto způsobem IR části budou "bezpečné" před nechtěným autostrut zatímco ještě nutný schopnost autostrut na kolech, např. </font></font>
> 

My mistake, I apologize. My English is not very good, I overlooked it.

Fab! Thanks for this, just tested and worked in 1.2.1! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Have anyone else got weird behavior if craft have wheels or legs and the first IR detail is rotatron? My testing craft slides by phantom force on 3.4 m/s when I try to rotate first rotatron (doking washer type from legacy pack on screen). Further rotating can even destroy craft. But if there is any IR part between rotatron and wheels or legs - it rotates normally (example is rework rotatron on screen ). Pivotrons and extendatrons work normal even when are first IR part from wheels/legs. KSP 1.2, IR 2.0.7

Spoiler

1 screen - rotating 1st rotatron - phantom force:

![PobCWdW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PobCWdW.jpg)

2 screen - rotating upper rotatron - everything normal:

![BFz8jQF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BFz8jQF.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-13T21:14:54Z" title="11/13/2016 09:14  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 13, 2016</time> by Warro**
  
typo

> 
> 
> 55 minutes ago, Warro said:
> 
> 
> Have anyone else got weird behavior if craft have wheels or legs and the first IR detail is rotatron?
> 

Yep. Everyone else who place landing gears or wheels too close to IR parts. KJR if used could also be issue. Mentioned few pages back.

It is due to stock wheel/landing gear autostrut feature that can't be disabled. Wheels/landing gears aims to closest heaviest part to autostrut with. That cause issues with IR moving parts. You can try to put some other parts between IR parts and landing gears, but it not work in every situation.

Trial and error mostly, until you figure out what you can do and what you need to avoid when building craft.

Hi guys  , just a quick question,  for some reason i can get the tool bar icon in <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr> <abbr title="SpacePlane Hangar">SPH</abbr>  or in game. i followed instructions to the T. All the parts are showing all the options are there when i right click the part,  but no tool bar icon so i cant get the interface on screen.  please help. thank you gents.  

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-14T02:20:16Z" title="11/14/2016 02:20  AM" data-short="7 yr">November 14, 2016</time> by mechanicH**

> > > 1 hour ago, mechanicH said: > > > Hi guys , just a quick question, for some reason i can get the tool bar icon in VAB SPH or in game. i followed instructions to the T. All the parts are showing all the options are there when i right click the part, but no tool bar icon so i cant get the interface on screen. please help. thank you gents. > I assume you are talking about the Blizzy Toolbar icon? I myself just manually changed the 0 to a 1 in the config.xml under "MagicSmokeIndustries/Plugins/PluginData/InfernalRobotics" line "0" to "1" And just because I couldn't keep this to myself ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

[@V8jester](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/136093-v8jester/)  So i was playing around with it last night and uninstalling/reinstalling and tweaking the cfg , and i accidentally left the asset bundle file in at one point or another. and by some magic the icon showed up and now it works perfect. (even thought the instructions told me to take it out).

Noticed similar issue with toolbar. Fresh KSP install and just started to hunt down working mods and install them.

Fresh install, blizzy toolbar is empty, but shown on UI, so you can choose size/positon and icons you want to be there.  

If I add only IR icon on it, toolbar itself become invisible. If you leave it like that, there is no chance to configure it properly again except by deleting toolbar-settings.dat file located in "GameData" root folder.

Workaround from this, at least in my case is to put final frontier icon, so it can stay visible even when you click on "broken" icon from other mods like IR.

Hhave yet to try to edit IR xml config file to suport toolbar, as V8jester suggested.

Hey there, just reporting an issue: I have, let's say, an extendatron. I extend it fully, then timewarp (non-physical). When I come out of warp, if I try to retract it, it will spazz out, and end up being doubly extended, like, floating-in-space extended. Funny thing, I can keep doing that until it's quite far away.

No KJR here, just a bunch of other stuff. I'm curious to see if someone can reproduce it, if not, then it's probably some conflict on my end.

> 
>

> No KJR here, just a bunch of other stuff. I'm curious to see if someone can reproduce it, if not, then it's probably some conflict on my end.
> 

Yeah there is something going on with IR and warping or Hyperedit ATM in 1.2.1. I believe [@Ziw](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/135292-ziw/) is aware of it but I think he and the rest of the IR team are currently taking a much needed and deserved break from the madness that is KSP. Hopefully it won't stay broke for too long. But for now I would say. "Stay tuned" and be patient.

I'm getting this problem with the rework parts. Edit: after downloading the legacy parts I still get the same issue.  

Kinda puts a damper on grabbing and recovering a satellite lol  

Spoiler

![hxLbJ1o.png](http://i.imgur.com/hxLbJ1o.png)

It happens with any part I use, and sometimes it invokes the Kraken.  

Anything I can do to fix this?  

Also I do have the latest version of KJR
